channel.title: c1a3 minor map/npcs glitch [Fixed]
channel.description:
[url='https://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=5nlr10&s=6']https://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=5nlr10&s=6[/url]
Physics in games arent perfect - those barrells shouldve fallen down when stepped on them. Anyway - this allows you to miss some fire exchange with army boys.
I was actually looking for a way to attack them from behind. Problem is - spawning happens when you go the "proper" way - this means I found only 3 guys and then, soldiers "magically" appeared in empty before rooms.

item.title: c1a3 minor map/npcs glitch [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: piter
item.description:
https://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=5nlr10&s=6

Physics in games arent perfect - those barrells shouldve fallen down when stepped on them. Anyway - this allows you to miss some fire exchange with army boys.

I was actually looking for a way to attack them from behind. Problem is - spawning happens when you go the “proper” way - this means I found only 3 guys and then, soldiers “magically” appeared in empty before rooms.

Read full topic
